languages.text: "Да разве ж могла эта женщина знать наверняка, что муж вернется из такой заварушки? Хозяйство простаивало, вот она все и взяла в свои руки. Между прочим, шерин, на Ифрите как раз для таких случаев позволено брать себе несколько супругов. Что вам стоит изменить законы мира, откуда родом Леди Моллес-Секандас? Пусть и дальше пополняет вашу казну, а уж справиться с двумя мужьями ей будет вовсе не трудно!"

"How could the woman have possibly known for sure her husband would make it out of a major dustup like that? The business had ground to a halt, so she took things in her own hands. Actually, shereen, on Efreet you're allowed to take several spouses precisely in case this happens. It would be a trifle for you to amend the laws of Lady Molles-Secundas's homeworld. Let her continue to fill your coffers — she's more than able to handle two husbands!"
languages.original_text: "Да разве ж могла эта женщина знать наверняка, что муж вернется из такой заварушки? Хозяйство простаивало, вот она все и взяла в свои руки. Между прочим, шерин, на Ифрите как раз для таких случаев позволено брать себе несколько супругов. Что вам стоит изменить законы мира, откуда родом Леди Моллес-Секандас? Пусть и дальше пополняет вашу казну, а уж справиться с двумя мужьями ей будет вовсе не трудно!"

traits.locale_text: "How could the woman have possibly known for sure her husband would make it out of a major dustup like that? The business had ground to a halt, so she took things in her own hands. Actually, shereen, on Efreet you're allowed to take several spouses precisely in case this happens. It would be a trifle for you to amend the laws of Lady Molles-Secundas's homeworld. Let her continue to fill your coffers, and she's not one to have trouble handling two husbands!"

Actually, shereen, on Efreet you're allowed to take several spouses precisely in case this happens. It would be a trifle for you to amend the laws of Lady Molles-Secundas's homeworld. Let her continue to fill your coffers — she's more than able to handle two husbands!"

languages.text: "Wie hätte die Frau wissen können, dass ihr Mann mit dem Leben davonkommen würde? Das Geschäft war zum Erliegen gekommen, also nahm sie es selbst in die Hand. Auf Efreet ist es erlaubt, mehrere Ehepartner zu haben, wenn genau dieser Fall eintritt, Shereen. Es wäre ein Leichtes für Euch, die Gesetze von Lady Molles-Secundas' Heimatwelt anzupassen. Lasst sie weiter eure Schatullen füllen ... sie kommt sehr gut mit zwei Männern zurecht!"
languages.original_text: "How could the woman have possibly known for sure her husband would make it out of a major dustup like that? The business had ground to a halt, so she took things in her own hands. Actually, shereen, on Efreet you're allowed to take several spouses precisely in case this happens. It would be a trifle for you to amend the laws of Lady Molles-Secundas's homeworld. Let her continue to fill your coffers — she's more than able to handle two husbands!"

traits.locale_text: "Wie hätte die Frau wissen können, dass ihr Mann mit dem Leben davonkommen würde? Das Geschäft war zum Erliegen gekommen, also nahm sie es selbst in die Hand. Auf Efreet ist es erlaubt, mehrere Ehepartner zu haben, wenn genau dieser Fall eintritt, Shereen. Es wäre ein Leichtes für Euch, die Gesetze von Lady Molles-Secundas' Heimatwelt anzupassen. Lasst sie weiter eure Schatullen füllen ... sie kommt sehr gut mit zwei Männern zurecht!"

languages.text: « Comment cette femme aurait-elle pu savoir que son mari survivrait à un tel coup du sort ? Les affaires étant au point mort, elle a décidé de prendre les choses en main. Pour ne rien vous cacher, shereen, sur Éfrit, il est tout à fait légal de prendre plusieurs époux au cas où ce genre de situation se présenterait. Ce serait une simple formalité pour vous que de modifier les lois en vigueur dans le monde de dame Molles-Secundas. Qu'elle continue à remplir vos coffres, elle est largement capable d'entretenir deux maris à la fois ! »
languages.original_text: "How could the woman have possibly known for sure her husband would make it out of a major dustup like that? The business had ground to a halt, so she took things in her own hands. Actually, shereen, on Efreet you're allowed to take several spouses precisely in case this happens. It would be a trifle for you to amend the laws of Lady Molles-Secundas's homeworld. Let her continue to fill your coffers — she's more than able to handle two husbands!"

traits.locale_text: « Comment cette femme aurait-elle pu savoir que son mari survivrait à un tel coup du sort ? Les affaires étant au point mort, elle a décidé de prendre les choses en main. Pour ne rien vous cacher, shereen, sur Éfrit, il est tout à fait légal de prendre plusieurs époux au cas où ce genre de situation se présenterait. Ce serait une simple formalité pour vous que de modifier les lois en vigueur dans le monde de dame Molles-Secundas. Qu'elle continue à remplir vos coffres, elle est largement capable d'entretenir deux maris à la fois ! »

languages.text: “当初那个女人的丈夫遭遇了可怕的意外，她怎么可能想得到她丈夫还能平安归来？家族的生意陷入了困顿，她也只能靠自己的能力挑起大梁。亲爱的，艾弗里特的律法规定，每个人都可以享有多位配偶，这就是为了防止发生这样的事情。对你而言，修改莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人故乡的法律也不过是小事一桩。让她继续为你的国库服务吧，她完全有能力应付两个丈夫！”
languages.original_text: "How could the woman have possibly known for sure her husband would make it out of a major dustup like that? The business had ground to a halt, so she took things in her own hands. Actually, shereen, on Efreet you're allowed to take several spouses precisely in case this happens. It would be a trifle for you to amend the laws of Lady Molles-Secundas's homeworld. Let her continue to fill your coffers — she's more than able to handle two husbands!"

traits.locale_text: “当初那个女人的丈夫遭遇了可怕的意外，她怎么可能想得到她丈夫还能平安归来？家族的生意陷入了困顿，她也只能靠自己的能力挑起大梁。亲爱的，艾弗里特的律法规定，每个人都可以享有多位配偶，这就是为了防止发生这样的事情。对你而言，修改莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人故乡的法律也不过是小事一桩。让她继续为你的国库服务吧，她完全有能力应付两个丈夫！”

languages.text: «¿Cómo iba a saber la mujer si su marido sobrevivió a aquello? El negocio se había detenido por completo, así que tomó las riendas personalmente. De hecho, shereen, en Efreet está permitido tener varios cónyuges precisamente para casos como este. Para usted, sería trivial cambiar las leyes del mundo de lady Molles-Secundas. Deje que siga llenando sus arcas; ¡es más que capaz de lidiar con dos maridos!».
languages.original_text: "How could the woman have possibly known for sure her husband would make it out of a major dustup like that? The business had ground to a halt, so she took things in her own hands. Actually, shereen, on Efreet you're allowed to take several spouses precisely in case this happens. It would be a trifle for you to amend the laws of Lady Molles-Secundas's homeworld. Let her continue to fill your coffers — she's more than able to handle two husbands!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo iba a saber la mujer si su marido sobrevivió a aquello? El negocio se había detenido por completo, así que tomó las riendas personalmente. De hecho, shereen, en Efreet está permitido tener varios cónyuges precisamente para casos como este. Para usted, sería trivial cambiar las leyes del mundo de lady Molles-Secundas. Deje que siga llenando sus arcas; ¡es más que capaz de lidiar con dos maridos!».

languages.text: 「あの女は、夫があの大きな騒動から無事に戻ってくるとどうやって確信できたの？商売は止まっていた。だから彼女は自ら動いたのよ。実のところ、シェリーン、イフリートではこういう事態に備えて複数の配偶者を持つことが認められてるの。レディ・モレス・セクンダスの母星の法律を改正するなんて、アンタにとっては些細なことでしょ？彼女にはそのまま金庫を満たしてもらえばいいじゃない—夫を二人抱えるくらい、彼女には造作もないことよ！」
languages.original_text: "How could the woman have possibly known for sure her husband would make it out of a major dustup like that? The business had ground to a halt, so she took things in her own hands. Actually, shereen, on Efreet you're allowed to take several spouses precisely in case this happens. It would be a trifle for you to amend the laws of Lady Molles-Secundas's homeworld. Let her continue to fill your coffers — she's more than able to handle two husbands!"

traits.locale_text: 「あの女は、夫があの大きな騒動から無事に戻ってくるとどうやって確信できたの？商売は止まっていた。だから彼女は自ら動いたのよ。実のところ、シェリーン、イフリートではこういう事態に備えて複数の配偶者を持つことが認められてるの。レディ・モレス・セクンダスの母星の法律を改正するなんて、アンタにとっては些細なことでしょ？彼女にはそのまま金庫を満たしてもらえばいいじゃない—夫を二人抱えるくらい、彼女には造作もないことよ！」

languages.text: "Kocasının öyle büyük bir arbededen sağ çıkacağını nereden bilsin ki kadın? İşler de durma noktasına gelince kolları sıvayıvermiş. Biliyor musun şirinim, İfrit'te tam da bu sebepten birden fazla eşinin olmasına izin verilir. Leydi Molles-Secundas'ın ana yurdundaki kanunları eğip bükmekle uğraşma derim. Bırak senin de cebini doldursun... İki kocayı birden çok rahat idare eder bu!"
languages.original_text: "How could the woman have possibly known for sure her husband would make it out of a major dustup like that? The business had ground to a halt, so she took things in her own hands. Actually, shereen, on Efreet you're allowed to take several spouses precisely in case this happens. It would be a trifle for you to amend the laws of Lady Molles-Secundas's homeworld. Let her continue to fill your coffers — she's more than able to handle two husbands!"

traits.locale_text: "Kocasının öyle büyük bir arbededen sağ çıkacağını nereden bilsin ki kadın? İşler de durma noktasına gelince kolları sıvayıvermiş. Biliyor musun şirinim, İfrit'te tam da bu sebepten birden fazla eşinin olmasına izin verilir. Leydi Molles-Secundas'ın ana yurdundaki kanunları eğip bükmekle uğraşma, derim. Bırak senin de cebini doldursun... İki kocayı birden çok rahat idare eder bu!"
